greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of permutations p of [n] with no fixed points and cyclic displacement of elements restricted by eight: p(i)<>i and (i-p(i) mod n <= 8 or p(i)-i mod n <= 8).
maple: `if`(i<>j and (i-j mod n<=8 or j-i mod n<=8), 1, 0)))):
mathematica: a[n_] := If[n == 0, 1, Permanent[Table[If[i != j && (Mod[i - j, n] <= 8 || Mod[j - i, n] <= 8), 1, 0], {i, 1, n}, {j, 1, n}]]]; Table[an = a[n]; Print["a(", n, ") = ", an]; an, {n, 0, 18}] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Jan 06 2016, adapted from Maple *)
results.author: _Alois P. Heinz_, Jul 16 2015
